name: eSports Manager (itch)
description:
Controls:

  • Arrows to move
  • Space to begin game

Fix computers when they break down or lose fame!

--

This game was created for the first Bytejam which was a 2x8 hrs game jam held in May 18th-19th 2019. All development was done with Godot and graphics were created with GIMP except for the title screen and game over texts which were hastily done with an online tool once again.
